title: WEB DESIGN
content: What I’m currently most interested in learning more about. After creating this site and taking part in React web development courses, I feel like I’ll focus more time on web development in the near future.

title: MACHINE LEARNING
content: Projects like CUSD, the Audio ML work, and the Axidraw Shading work exhibit my understanding of ML. Hopefully I’ll continue to improve at developing models through course work and other projects.

title: GAME DESIGN
content: Video games were the original reason I considered becoming a Computer Science student, and over the course of “Grow Crazy”s development I’ve become proficient in understanding game development concepts.

title: IMPROV COMEDY
content: Going on 7 years of improvisational comedy. While it’s amazing to both watch and participate, it’s hard to forget how useful it is in everyday life.
